nodes.text: NovaCORE was a company based on Coruscant. It had a kelerium processing plant during the Galactic Civil War where Kaa'to Leeachos, a Kadas'sa'Nikto bounty hunter, took shelter in the plant after he betrayed the Pyke Syndicate, a powerful underworld syndicate, who subsequently dispatched a group of agents to apprehend the Nikto.
